review: We had 2 Chrome Casts in our house that drove me insane and I wanted to smash them! Now I have the Apple TV in our bedroom and I love it, love it, love it! I couldn't stream from the Lifetime app on my Iphone to the Chrome Cast so I bought the Apple TV so I could mirror the app to my TV. I don't even need to do that since the Lifetime app comes installed on the Apple TV and I can easily stream my shows.
